唫字的基本解释

唫
jìn
口闭。

唫
yín
同“吟”。

唫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》渠飲切，上寢，羣。］
(1)噤。闭口不言。
(2)吸。
(3)为饮。
[②]［yín］
［《廣韻》魚金切，平侵，疑。］
(1)同“吟”。叹息；吟咏。
(2)通“崟”。高险的山岩。

唫字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　唫； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页193第11
【唐韻】【韻會】巨錦切【集韻】渠飲切，?音噤。【說文】口急也。　又閉也。【揚子·太?經】萬物各唫。【註】隂陽唫閉，故曰唫。【黃帝素問】呿唫之徵。【註】呿，開口。唫，閉口也。　又【廣韻】魚金切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】魚音切，?音吟。義同。　又【玉篇】古文吟字。註詳四畫。【前漢·息夫躬傳】秋風爲我唫。　又【集韻】祛音切，音欽。口急也。　又同崟。【穀梁傳·僖三十三年】必於殽之巖唫之下。【釋文】唫本作崟。一音欽。

唫字的源字形

唫字的起名意思

本意为口闭，也有吟咏之义。

唫
Basic explanation of words
唫
jìn
Mouth closed.
唫
yín
Same as "Yin".
唫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Guang Yun" can drink and cut, go to bed, group. ]
(1) Silence. Keep your mouth shut.
(2) Sucking.
(3) For drinking.
[②]［yín］
["Guangyun" fish gold cut, flat invasion, suspicious. ]
(1) Same as "Yin". Sigh; chant.
(2) Through "Yang". High-risk rocks.
唫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　唫; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 193-11
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Club] Jujin Cut [Ji Yun] Can drink and cut,? The sound is muted. [Speaking] Urgent speech.　Close again. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】Everything has each other. 【Note】Yin and Yang are closed, so it is called 唫. [Huang Di Su Wen] The sign of 呿唫. [Note] Suck, speak. Hey, shut up.　[Guangyun] Yujinqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Fishyin cut,? Yinyin. The same meaning.　[Yu Pian] Ancient Chinese Yin Words. Note the four paintings in detail. [Previous Han Shifu Biography] The autumn wind is for me.　[Jiyun] Quyinqie, Yinqin. Anxious too.　The same 崟 again. [Thirty-three Years of Guliang Chuan] It must be under the rock of Yizhi. [Explanation] This is a 崟. Yiyinqin.
唫

Old glyph
唫
Name meaning
The original meaning is to close the mouth, but also has the meaning of chanting.
yín, jìn
1) yín вм. 吟 (вздыхать, стонать, оплакивать)
2) jìn книжн. закрывать рот; замолкать
